use.flag: Support for ARM disassembly via dev-libs/capstone
Support for CMSIS-DAP adapter driver via dev-libs/hidapi
Support for USB FTDI chips via dev-embedded/libftdi
Support for linuxgpiod driver via dev-libs/libgpiod
Support for J-Link driver via dev-embedded/libjaylink
Verbose IO and comm JTAG and USB messages
